scripts.linux-build: npm run setup && tsc && rsync -av views/ dist/views/ && rsync -av config/.env dist/config/ && rsync -av problems/ dist/problems/
scripts.win-build: npm run setup && tsc && robocopy views dist/views /E && robocopy config dist/config .env && robocopy problems dist/problems /E
scripts.win-build & start: npm run win-build && npm run start
scripts.linux-build & start: npm run linux-build && npm run start
